mapper.select: SELECT mzgg.`id`, mzg.zone_name AS zoneName, mzg.transformation_threshold AS transformationThreshold FROM marketing_zone_group_grouping mzgg LEFT JOIN marketing_zone_group mzg ON mzgg.marketing_zone_group_id = mzg.id WHERE mzgg.`member_list_id` = #{memberId} ORDER BY mzgg.create_time DESC
